content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good morning, Hassan. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would appreciate it if you could offer me the highest rental price possible.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can't offer you the highest price. My budget is limited, but I am willing to negotiate. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand that your budget is limited, but I would appreciate it if you could offer me a rental price that is within your means. As the landlord, I am looking for a fair rental price that will help me maximize my gains.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can offer you 500 Euros per month.

Please let me know if this is acceptable or not.

I don't want to continue the negotiation.

TERMINATE.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I appreciate your offer, Hassan. However, I am looking for a rental price that is higher than 500 Euros per month. I understand that you may have a limited budget, but I would appreciate it if you could offer me a rental price that is within your means and still allows me to maximize my gains as the landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine
